document.full_text: the euro slipped and world stocks were stuck on monday with fears of a greek debt default undimmed and u.s. and uk market holidays keeping many investors on the sidelines.
document.title: greek debt fears weigh on euro, curb world stocks
lines_and_colors: the euro slipped and world stocks were stuck on monday with fears of a greek debt default undimmed and u.s. and uk market holidays keeping many investors on the sidelines.
